titleStmt.title: Annus mirabilis, The year of wonders, 1666 an historical poem containing the progress and various successes of our naval war with Holland, under the conduct of His Highness Prince Rupert, and His Grace the Duke of Albemarl : and describing the fire of London / by John Dryden, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
